mapper.select: select * from box_gw where boxcode=#{boxcode} and boxname=#{boxname} and gwtime=#{gwtime} and gw=#{gw} and remark=#{remark} and creator=#{creator} and createdt=#{createdt} and modifyby=#{modifyby} and modifydt=#{modifydt}
mapper.insert: insert box_gw （ boxcode, boxname, gwtime, gw, remark, creator, createdt, modifyby, modifydt) values( #{boxcode}, #{boxname}, #{gwtime}, #{gw}, #{remark}, #{creator}, #{createdt}, #{modifyby}, #{modifydt})
mapper.update: update box_gw set boxcode=#{boxcode}, boxname=#{boxname}, gwtime=#{gwtime}, gw=#{gw}, remark=#{remark}, creator=#{creator}, createdt=#{createdt}, modifyby=#{modifyby}, modifydt=#{modifydt} where rowid=#{rowid}
